history.proof: intros A' B' a b H1 H2. intros. sfirstorder depth: 3.

exceptions.tactic: intros A B a b H1 H2.
intros A' B a b H1 H2.

ctx: intros A' B' a b H1 H2.

original: intros A B a b H1 H2. unfold increasing. intros n n' H3. unfold join in H3. destruct H3. split. - apply H1. apply H. auto. - apply H2. apply H0. auto.
